Name: Gnome Light
About the game: Enter Gnorbert's dreamworld, and explore his inner most thoughts and fears. Memories of his life are throughout the game, hidden in puzzles and hidden treasures. Gnorberts epic tale through his own mind will take him to his worst memories, best memories and test his spirit. You never know what dreams might contain be careful! A magical light helps Gnorbert navigate through his dreams, it helps him see, can burn light objects and much more. Cast it to reach out, or retract it and run more swiftly. The Light can also help collect fireflies, a key ingredient used to open magic portals. Fireflies also help Gnorbert, each collected insect increases Gnorbert's ability to jump. Chests can be found throughout the game, these items aren't necessary for the puzzles but can unlock different memories in the game. Keep your eye out for hidden passages and trails they might lead you to unexpected treasures!
